#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
ll dp[51][51];
string s;
ll dy_pro(int i,int j)
{
        if(i>j)
          return dp[i][j]=0;
        if(i==j)
                return dp[i][j]=1;
        if(dp[i][j]!=-1)
        return dp[i][j];        
        if(s[i]==s[j]) 
          return dp[i][j]=1+dy_pro(i+1,j)+dy_pro(i,j-1);
        else
          return dp[i][j]=dy_pro(i+1,j)+dy_pro(i,j-1)-dy_pro(i+1,j-1);
 } 
int main()
{
        ll k,i,j,t,n;
        cin>>t;
        while(t--)
        {
                memset(dp,0,sizeof dp);
                cin>>s;
                n=s.size();
                for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
                for(j=0;j<=n;j++)
                 dp[i][j]=-1;
                cout<<dy_pro(0,n-1)<<"\n";
        }
        return 0;
}
